metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11037 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In PHP imagick extension in versions between 3.3.0 and 3.4.4, writing to anarray of values in ImagickKernel::fromMatrix() function did not check thatthe address will be within the allocated array. This could lead to out ofbounds write to memory if the function is called with the data controlledby untrusted party.

criterions.comment: php-imagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
